import React, { useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const AddOwner = () => { const [modalMessage, setModalMessage] = useState(""); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/add_owner", { method: "POST", body: formData, }); const data = await response.json(); setModalMessage(data.success ? `✅ ${data.message}` : `❌ ${data.message}`); setShowModal(true); if (data.success) e.target.reset(); } catch (error) { console.error("Full Fetch Error:", error); setModalMessage("❌ Error submitting form! Check console for details."); setShowModal(true); } }; const closeModal = () => setShowModal(false); return (

); }; export default AddOwner;
